meanings.definition: Used as an archaic or poetic form of 'yourself'.
meanings.sent1: When thou art alone, remember to take care of thyself.
meanings.sent2: It is important to always be true to thyself.
meanings.sent3: Do not forget to be kind to thyself, for others may not always be.
meanings.sent4: In the mirror, see thyself as a reflection of your inner beauty.
meanings.sent5: Love thyself first, and everything else will fall into place.

meanings.definition: Referring to the person being addressed.
meanings.sent1: Wouldst thou like to express thyself freely?
meanings.sent2: Speak up for thyself and let your voice be heard.
meanings.sent3: Thou shouldst not take thyself too seriously all the time.
meanings.sent4: In a crowd, find thyself by standing out with your unique qualities.
meanings.sent5: Believe in thyself, for you are capable of great things.
